name: Submarine Treasure Hunt
description:
Submission to the Godot Wild Jam #41

Race against the clock with your submarine and find all the orbs around the map before time runs out!

Accessibility

I tried making this game accessible to the widest audience I could during the jam time frame. However, I wasn't able to implement all features I was hoping for.

Let's all make our games more accessible!

Credits

SFX by Kenney

Music: www.bensound.com
